title: Runner 2 Steam-Rip CRACKED-RG GameWorks
description:
Runner 2 Steam-Rip CRACKED-RG GameWorks


Information:


Release date : February 26, 2013
Genre: Indie
Developer: Gaijin Games
Publisher: Gaijin Games
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English
Sound language: English
Tablet: Present [deadmau5 / SKiDROW]


Description:


BIT.TRIP Presents Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien third part of 
a series BIT.TRIP. This is the fastest, hardcore, and the most fun musical platformer. Conquer over 50 levels to the beat of atmospheric retro soundtrack!


System Requirements:


Operating System: Windows Vista (SP 2) / 7/8
Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5-750 or 2.7 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 805
RAM: 2048 MB
Free space on HDD: 890 MB
Video: GeForce 8 series (8000) or Radeon HD4 series (HD4000)


Installation Steps:


1) Download the torrent.

2) Install the game by running setup.exe.

3) Copy the contents of the folder NoDVD in Main Game folder.

4) Block Firewall and Disable Antivirus.

5) Play.
